rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: If you look at the cases that have occurred since 1997, when it [H5N1] first emerged in human cases in Hong Kong, through to mid-2015 to 2016, those years were by far the highest-risk situation. We’ve seen very few cases in humans since then [mid-2015/2016].

rationale: 'highest-risk situation' is Q1 (Intensifier + Risk-Noun), not a high-potency verb or metaphor (Q2).
